item.title: Baidu’s Apollo Go Gets Dubai's First Autonomous Driving Test Permit, Commences On-Road Trials
item.description: Apollo Go and the RTA also plan to expand the fleet to over 1,000 fully driverless vehicles over the next three years, the firm stated.

item.title: IREN Stock Surged 15% Today – Here’s A Price Target Update

item.title: Hyperliquid’s USDH Stablecoin Goes Live, Kicks Off Action With $2.3M Volume In Early Trading
item.description: USDH, developed by Native Markets, is the first dollar-pegged token to make it through Hyperliquid’s validator-driven selection process.
